title: D2 soloq Looking for flex frens
body:
Can play adc mid jg 
looking for dia+ solo q to flex queue with add me @ Wuke

replies.body: for flex do u mean as in not diamond like starting off from placements cos although im in bonze (im good i just get teams that feed) becasue im only on placements for flex but i am happy to join ps i main adc
funny guy with a funny comment
